excerpt: "It’s forecasted that the global AI market will grow rapidly in the coming years, reaching up to $126 billion by 2025. In Fintech alone, the use of AI in 2019 reached an estimated value of $6.67 bn and is expected to grow over $22.6 bn in just five years."
